CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 17, 1967, pg. 14 reads: "To Be Wed - Mr. and Mrs. David Graham of Schenley Heights, announce the engagement of Mrs. Graham's daughter, Alverta Martin, to Joseph Simpson Jr. of Weirton, W. Va. The bride-elect is the daughter of the late Rev. O.L. Martin, former pastor of Calvary Baptist Church where an open church double-ring ceremony will be held July 15.  The Rev. James A. Cox will officiate. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alverta Martin wearing open collar suit and beehive hairstyle posed on arm of sofa in interior, possibly Anaheim Street, another pose
